person.persName: Joseph Campion (Louisville, Kentucky, wharf master and mail agent)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, wharf master and mail agent. Native of Ireland. Married to Rose Ann Burn Campion in Floyd County, Indiana, on August 21, 1846. Father of Ann Campion, Anna Campion, John M. Campion, G.F.M. Campion, William S.O.B. Campion, and Mary R. Campion. Wharf master in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned one enslaved person in Louisville in 1850. Mail agent in Louisville in 1858. Wharf master in Louisville from 1855 to 1864. Owned two enslaved persons in Louisville in 1860. Agent for the United States Mail Line Company in Louisville in 1865.
